channel.title: Goldeneye: Source
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JcerR3Z8C_M As far as I know it's only multiplayer, and there's never really a lot of active servers. Seems like it would be really fun. I hated the controls for it on the n64 but otherwise the gameplay was great. To play it i'm pretty sure you need half-life 2 but I might be wrong.
lead developer killed himself in 2006, kinda sad. people are still carrying it on, but it looks like the last update was around mid September.
